mapper.select: SELECT * FROM menus WHERE write_user_id = #{writerId} AND name LIKE '%${menuName}%' LIMIT #{menuBgnIdx},#{menuPerPage};
SELECT * FROM menus WHERE write_user_id = #{writerId} AND tags LIKE '%${tag}%' LIMIT #{menuBgnIdx},#{menuPerPage};
SELECT * FROM menus WHERE record_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT id FROM records WHERE write_user_id = #{writerId} AND where_place LIKE '%${place}%') LIMIT #{menuBgnIdx},#{menuPerPage};
SELECT * FROM menus WHERE record_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT id FROM records WHERE write_user_id = #{writerId} AND who_with LIKE '%${who}%') LIMIT #{menuBgnIdx},#{menuPerPage};
mapper.update: UPDATE menus SET name=#{name}, pic_url=#{picUrl}, price=#{price}, tags=#{tags}, score=#{score} WHERE id = #{id};
